translation.en: [quiz show host] That'll be true or false.
The "Ali" of the title is the Welsh football manager?
translation.it: L'"Ali" del titolo è l'allenatore di calcio gallese?

translation.en: -[guest] False. -[host] Yes. Two points scored. And finally, to Carl…
translation.it: - Falso. - Sì. Due punti per voi. Per finire, Carl…

translation.en: [Robbie Williams] Last night, in the middle of the night, I got up.
translation.it: Ieri mi sono alzato nel cuore della notte.

translation.en: [host] Yes, two points. A total of six to the reds!
translation.it: Sì, due punti. Sei punti in tutto per i rossi!

translation.en: [Robbie] I'd been awake all night.
[host] Great! Now over to the yellows to do the spinning.
translation.it: Ok, ora tocca ai gialli girare la ruota.

translation.en: [Robbie] When it comes time to sleep, my body goes, "We're not!"
translation.it: Quando arriva l'ora di dormire, il mio corpo si rifiuta.

translation.en: "We're not."
Four hours of just tossing and turnin' and…
translation.it: Mi rigiro nel letto per quattro ore

translation.en: dealing with an amorphous blob of stuff.
translation.it: e lotto contro una massa amorfa di roba.

translation.en: [man] Fancy doing a bit of singing?
translation.it: Ti va di cantare un po'?

translation.en: [Robbie] Fear.
Shame.
Pain.
The whole gamut of human emotions.
I'm nearly 50.
I'm a dad, dad of four, with a loving wife.
translation.it: Sono padre. Ho quattro figli. Una moglie che mi ama.

translation.en: It's astounding what's happened in my life.
translation.it: Quel che mi è successo nella vita ha dell'incredibile,

translation.en: But it feels as though the past has me in a headlock.
translation.it: ma è come se il passato mi tenesse per il collo.

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] Robbie! Robbie! -[Robbie] Something has to give.
translation.it: Robbie! Robbie! La cosa deve cambiare.

translation.en: [Robbie] Go on, buddy! You can do it!
Come on!
-[man 1] You good? -I'm fuckin' good at this!
translation.it: - Tutto ok? - Sono troppo bravo, cazzo!

translation.en: [Graham Norton] One of the biggest-selling solo artists of all time.
translation.it: Sei uno degli artisti solisti che ha venduto di più nella storia.

translation.en: [Jonathan Ross] One of the greatest showmen. [man 2] …platinum albums, sell-out gigs…
translation.it: - Tra i più grandi showman al mondo… - …album di platino, date sold out…

translation.en: Keep telling me I'm fuckin' great.
translation.it: Continuate a dirmi che sono grande.

translation.en: Off me fucking tits.
Would anybody like to see me fight Liam?
translation.it: Qualcuno vuole vedermi fare a botte con Liam?

translation.en: See if you can do your best with that!
translation.it: Vediamo se sai fare di meglio!

translation.en: I'm fucking Robbie Williams.
[Robbie] I am trying to sort out the wreckage of the past.
translation.it: Sto cercando di risolvere i disastri del passato.

translation.en: And I'm picking a rather particular way to exorcise these demons right now.
translation.it: PARTE 1: SBALLIAMOCI Sto scegliendo un modo alquanto strano per esorcizzare questi demoni.

translation.en: [man 1] Why are we doing it here?
[Robbie] I'm a hermit. If I'm not on stage, I'm in bed.
translation.it: Sono un eremita. Se non sono sul palco, sono a letto.

translation.en: -[man 1] That's why we're here. -[man 2] Yeah.
[Robbie laughs] Yeah.
Can we just… Can we start?
[Robbie] When I was a kid, I was kinda like thick.
translation.it: Da ragazzino andavo male a scuola.

translation.en: Can't spell.
I can't add up or subtract.
[man] Tape is rolling.
[Robbie] I left school at 16 with no qualifications whatsoever
translation.it: Ho mollato la scuola a 16 anni senza arrivare al diploma

translation.en: and joined a boy band
translation.it: e sono entrato in una boy band,

translation.en: that's gonna be the English version of New Kids on the Block.
translation.it: la versione britannica dei New Kids on the Block.

translation.en: [man] Four, three, two, one.
[reporter] Fantastic!
Wow, the crowd loved you! How long have you been together?
translation.it: La folla vi adora! Da quanto tempo siete una band?

translation.en: -About two months. -Two months.
translation.it: - Da circa tre mesi. - Tre mesi.

translation.en: [reporter] Did you all dance beforehand?
Well, I didn't do much dancin'. Just, like, local discos and everythin'.
translation.it: Io non tanto. Solo in discoteca e cose così.

translation.en: But I did enough to keep up with these lot. -[laughter on video] -[video stops]
translation.it: Ma mi sono allenato tanto per star dietro a questi.

translation.en: Fuckin' 'ell.
Look at me!
I look very young.
You know, I was the baby of the band.
translation.it: Beh, ero il piccolino della band.

translation.en: [Robbie] I enjoyed everybody's company.
In my head, I'm looking up to these older brothers that are, like, 20, 21, 22.
translation.it: Ammiravo questi fratelli maggiori di 20, 21 e 22 anni.

translation.en: When you're 16, that's… that gap's huge.
[Robbie] I couldn't help but be in awe of Gaz.
translation.it: - Non potevo fare a meno di ammirare Gaz. - Sì!

translation.en: He was the captain of the ship.
How many songs have you actually got together now?
We've got probably about 30 tracks in all.
translation.it: CANTANTE/AUTORE TAKE THAT Abbiamo circa 30 pezzi.

translation.en: Every week, Gary's coming in with new material. We're doin' new dances all the time. ♪ Do what you like ♪
translation.it: Gary ha nuovo materiale ogni settimana e ogni volta creiamo nuovi balletti.

translation.en: [Robbie] In the early days of Take That, it was fun.
translation.it: Con i Take That all'inizio fu divertente.

translation.en: The joy and the excitement, the exhilaration.
It felt like this was all going somewhere.
translation.it: Come se questa cosa dovesse portarci lontano.

translation.en: It felt big! And then it became massive.
translation.it: Sembrava una cosa grossa! Poi divenne davvero enorme.

translation.en: Okay, so it's pretty quiet now, but you should've been here 20 minutes ago.
translation.it: Ora è tutto calmo, ma avreste dovuto essere qui 20 minuti fa.

translation.en: They are the hottest young band anywhere in the UK.
translation.it: Sono la band giovanile più in voga del Paese.

translation.en: …most popular British group since the Beatles.
translation.it: …il gruppo britannico più famoso dai Beatles.

translation.en: -[screaming] -Take That!
These girls say they've had the best night of their lives. -♪ You're my lifeline ♪ -♪ Whoa, whoa… ♪
translation.it: Queste ragazze hanno passato la serata più bella della loro vita.

translation.en: [Robbie] Our success did give some sort of sense of…
translation.it: Il nostro successo ci dava un senso di…

translation.en: [Robbie] But it was always intercut with…
[TV host] You're on bedroom walls across Britain, and you get mobbed wherever you go.
translation.it: Siete sui muri di tutto il Regno Unito, presi d'assalto ovunque.

translation.en: Do you still enjoy it?
[young Robbie] It's still enjoyable,
and it's like, um, I wake up in the morning pinchin' meself.
translation.it: Mi sveglio ancora ogni mattina dandomi dei pizzicotti.

translation.en: "Is this really happening?" and
it isn't.
-We're not 'ere really, are we? -No, we're not.
translation.it: - Infatti non siamo davvero qui, vero? - No.

translation.en: [current Robbie] Externally, I'm sure that I would've been full of bravado
and trying to look as though I think I'm the man.
translation.it: volevo dare l'idea di essere un vero uomo.

translation.en: It was a complete dunking
into the grown-up… world
that I wasn't ready for.
Thank you and good night!
The workload was relentless.
translation.it: Il carico di lavoro era implacabile.

translation.en: We do this.
Then we get to there.
There was no five minutes in front of us.
translation.it: Non avevamo un attimo di pausa.

translation.en: Reason they're screaming is 'cause Elvis is 'ere as well.
translation.it: Urlano perché qui c'è anche Elvis.

translation.en: Got to go and do an interview now for Radio 1.
translation.it: Devo andare a rilasciare un'intervista. A Radio 1.

translation.en: We'll hopefully have lots of fun.
[DJ] It is a very special Rockland this afternoon.
translation.it: È una domenica molto speciale qui a Rockland.

translation.en: As we promised a few weeks ago,
we have the members, all five members, of Take That in the studio.
translation.it: abbiamo in studio i cinque membri dei Take That.

translation.en: Gary and Howard and Jason and Robbie and Mark.
translation.it: Gary, Howard, Jason, Robbie e Mark.

translation.en: It's been going very well. Congratulations for the chart success you've had.
translation.it: Sta andando benone. Congratulazioni per il successo in classifica.

translation.en: How does it affect your everyday life when you get up in the morning?
translation.it: Questo come influenza la vostra quotidianità?

translation.en: To speak the truth, and this is honest, I wake up some mornings and think, "Where am I, what do we do, and what's me name?"
translation.it: A dire il vero a volte mi sveglio e penso: "Dove sono? Che facciamo? Come mi chiamo?"

translation.en: Who are you, what do you do, and what is yer name?
translation.it: Chi sei? Cosa fai? Come ti chiami?

translation.en: I'm Robbie.
I am in Take That, and I sing and dance.
translation.it: Sono nei Take That. Canto e ballo.

translation.en: It was an unusual scenario to be in.
In a very intense
background atmosphere and surrounding.
translation.it: e in un ambiente così intensi.

translation.en: That is a pressure cooker.
Without meaning to brag, it's been… it's been going good for us,
translation.it: Non per vantarci, ma ci sta andando alla grande.

translation.en: so it could end for us, like, at anytime, and then all the people we laugh at--
translation.it: Ma potrebbe finire in ogni momento. Le persone che scalziamo…

translation.en: [Robbie] I'm still down to earth and humble.
No, you're not! You're… You're downright arrogant and… and blasé and…
translation.it: Nient'affatto! Sei super arrogante e snob e…

translation.en: -Downright arrogant, yeah. -I'm not.
translation.it: - Super arrogante, sì. - Non è vero.

translation.en: You are.
[current Robbie] When I turned about 19, I started to have a long, hard think about what was happenin'.
translation.it: Compiuti i 19 anni, iniziai a riflettere su quanto stava accadendo.

translation.en: Too many interviews, too many performances,
so many countries to visit, and then repeat it.
translation.it: troppi Paesi da visitare, e poi tutto da capo.

translation.en: Mark's been up since half past five,
and I've been up since about quarter to six, six o'clock.
And we can't go to sleep. Jet lag. Who needs it? D'you know what I mean?
translation.it: Non riusciamo a dormire. Jet lag. Che senso ha? Capisci che voglio dire?

translation.en: Take That's fandom was obsessive.
[current Robbie] It was intense!
[man] Step!
[Robbie] On top of that, there was an assurancy about Gaz and his ability
translation.it: In più c'era la sicurezza di Gaz e delle sue capacità.

translation.en: mixed with
a coldness.
This is me prize lyric book, this is, and it's really strange to look through.
translation.it: Questo è il mio prezioso libro dei testi. È molto strano sfogliarlo. Contiene tutte le canzoni che ho scritto.

translation.en: It's got all the songs I've ever written.
translation.it: È molto strano sfogliarlo. Contiene tutte le canzoni che ho scritto.

translation.en: Every now and again, you'll find a little star next to it, which means it's gone on an album.
translation.it: Se c'è una stellina vicino significa che è finita in un album.

translation.en: That'll do me!
[Robbie] And it seemed like
translation.it: C'era una sola persona, nei Take That, ad avere un manager,

translation.en: there was one person being managed in Take That, and it was Gary Barlow.
translation.it: C'era una sola persona, nei Take That, ad avere un manager, ed era Gary Barlow.

translation.en: It was all geared around him.
And as a young person, I would've been jealous of that.
translation.it: Essendo io molto giovane, ne ero invidioso.

translation.en: I suppose a lot of me resented him.
translation.it: Una buona parte di me ce l'aveva con lui.

translation.en: One, two, three. "Hi, we're Take That." Okay?
translation.it: Un, due, tre. "Ciao, siamo i Take That."

translation.en: -You're gonna do it. -Okay.
translation.it: - Va bene? - Vai tu. Va bene.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Rob. I'm good. Watch this space for more of the same.
translation.it: Ciao, sono Rob. Sto bene. Guardateci per saperne di più.

translation.en: Ready. I'll do it.
-It's good. -Gaz, do you wanna sit at the front?
translation.it: - Va bene. - Gaz, vuoi sederti davanti?

translation.en: [current Robbie] I was goin' home from these days thinkin', "This is weird."
translation.it: All'epoca tornavo a casa e pensavo: "È strano.

translation.en: "Uncomfortable."
It's Lord of the Flies stuff.
translation.it: Roba da Il signore delle mosche.

translation.en: [current Robbie] I wasn't adept
translation.it: Non ero bravo ad avere a che fare

translation.en: at dealing with the dynamics in the band at such an early age.
translation.it: Non ero bravo ad avere a che fare con le dinamiche di una band, data la mia giovane età.

translation.en: And that's when the wheels came off
translation.it: E fu allora che iniziai a perdere il controllo.

translation.en: for me.
translation.it: che iniziai a perdere il controllo.

translation.en: [posh voice] People do tend to see us as the boys next door,
translation.it: La gente tende a considerarci i ragazzi della porta accanto

translation.en: and we still are, funnily enough.
We just happen to be the boys next door for the Lord Lichfield.
translation.it: Solo che siamo i vicini di casa di Lord Lichfield.

translation.en: Jacuzzis and outside ser--
Boy? Boy!
Oh, thank you very much.
Went out last night. Didn't get in until six o'clock.
translation.it: Ieri sera sono uscito. Sono rientrato alle 6:00.

translation.en: But, you know, do it while you're young, don't ya?
translation.it: Si fa così da giovani, no?

translation.en: Uh, as I say, really enjoying ourselves, so…
translation.it: Come dico sempre, ci divertiamo un sacco…

translation.en: -I've gotta get some booze! -Obsessed.
[Gary] Aw, don't. You've started this bastard now!
translation.it: - Sei fissato. - No! Hai scatenato questo bastardo!

translation.en: [current Robbie] Adding petrol to the fire,
I was ingestin' everything that I could get my hands on.
translation.it: buttavo giù qualsiasi cosa mi capitasse a tiro.

translation.en: Ecstasy, cocaine, drinking.
Couldn't eat a whole one! Wahey!
I'm literally drinking, like, a bottle of vodka bef… a night before going into rehearsals.
translation.it: Ero arrivato a bere una bottiglia di vodka la sera prima delle prove.

translation.en: So that's happenin'.
That's happenin' every night.
There was meetings that were had with me
translation.it: Facevamo delle riunioni per parlare di me.

translation.en: where… "we need you to behave" meetings.
What's the best thing about being here?
translation.it: La cosa più bella dell'essere qui?

translation.en: Um… People not expecting me to be 'ere, and the reaction on their faces when they see me.
translation.it: Non si aspettavano di vedermi. Le loro facce quando mi vedono.

translation.en: [woman] Go behind him like a Glastonbury nutter.
translation.it: Vagli dietro come uno svitato a Glastonbury.

translation.en: [Robbie] It's a Glastonbury nutter.
It's one of them people that get on It'll be Alright… It's Alright on the Night thing.
translation.it: Di quelli che finiscono su candid camera.

translation.en: [current Robbie] It may have been seen by management that I was letting the side down.
translation.it: Si erano accorti che stavo perdendo il controllo.

translation.en: Especially when I went to Glastonbury.
Anarchy.
[current Robbie] I was told, "This is not how you behave in a boy band."
translation.it: Mi dissero: "In una boy band non ci si comporta così".

translation.en: Actually got nothing interesting whatsoever to say.
translation.it: In realtà non ho niente di interessante da dire.

translation.en: Which is quite un… uh…
quite a bit disturbin'.
[current Robbie] The sense that, um,
I wasn't ready or capable to fulfill the role
translation.it: di non esser pronto o in grado di svolgere il ruolo

translation.en: that was being asked of me was palpable.
translation.it: che mi veniva assegnato era palese.

translation.en: One day, I went in for rehearsals,
and then at lunchtime, they said, "Rob, we need to have a band meeting."
translation.it: e a ora di pranzo mi dissero: "Dobbiamo fare una riunione".

translation.en: I said to the boys I just couldn't be there anymore.
translation.it: Dissi ai ragazzi che non potevo più stare nella band.

translation.en: Then they said, "Look, we wanna see if we can do this tour as a four-piece."
translation.it: E loro: "Vogliamo vedere se riusciamo a fare il tour senza di te.

translation.en: "What do you think?"
And in the end,
you know, "What do you think?" was me deciding to
translation.it: fu quel "che ne pensi?" a farmi decidere

translation.en: leave Take That.
Finally, tonight, the band minus one.
translation.it: E infine, una band perde un pezzo.

translation.en: Take That are arguably Britain's most successful group since the Beatles,
translation.it: I Take That sono il gruppo britannico di maggior successo dopo i Beatles,

translation.en: but when they arrived today to record for the BBC's Top of the Pops,
translation.it: ma quando sono arrivati oggi a registrare Top of the Pops per la BBC,

translation.en: there were just four of them.
[reporter] Is anybody angry with Robbie?
[all shout] Yes!
[reporter] Would you listen to his music if he does a solo career?
translation.it: Ascolterete la sua musica se inizierà una carriera da solista?

translation.en: -No. -♪ Got a head of shattered dreams ♪
[man] Did you have a plan?
[current Robbie] I think the… the plan was
translation.it: Credo che il mio piano fosse:

translation.en: "Let's get wrecked."
♪ Whatever I said, whatever I did I didn't mean it ♪ ♪ I just want ya back for good ♪ ♪ I want you back, I want you back… ♪
[current Robbie] I moved to London as a famous 21-year-old,
translation.it: Quando mi trasferii a Londra ero 21enne famoso

translation.en: and I'm just going to parties all the time.
translation.it: e passavo da una festa all'altra.

translation.en: I had no direction.
No reason to be.
I'm losing a lot of days to hangovers.
translation.it: Sprecavo i giorni a farmi passare la sbornia.

translation.en: Losing a sense of self.
translation.it: Perdendo il senso di me stesso.

translation.en: Turnin' into something that you don't recognize.
Wanted to make somethin' of myself.
translation.it: Volevo fare qualcosa della mia vita.

translation.en: Achieve somethin'. Be someone.
But there's nothing that I'm doing.
I was just in Groucho doin' a lotta coke.
translation.it: Pensavo solo a farmi di coca.

translation.en: [woman] What would you do if you weren't a musician?
translation.it: Cosa vorresti fare se non fossi un musicista?

translation.en: -[Robbie] Uh… -Be a footballer?
I dunno, actually. Probably be a pig farmer.
translation.it: Non saprei. Forse l'allevatore di suini.

translation.en: [current Robbie] I needed somebody to help me with the thoughts and melodies
translation.it: Mi serviva qualcuno che mi aiutasse coi pensieri e i mali

translation.en: that I have in my head.
♪ Ooh ♪ ♪ Ooh, ooh ♪
[interviewer] So, who are you?
Who am I? I'm Guy. And I'm, uh…
translation.it: Chi sono? Sono Guy. DIRETTORE ARTISTICO/CO-AUTORE

translation.en: uh, Rob's MD and producer.
translation.it: Direttore artistico e produttore di Rob.

translation.en: [interviewer] So what does that involve?
Mm. You haven't got… How much film have you got?
-[Guy] No rest for the wicked. -[Robbie] No rest for the wicked!
translation.it: - Non c'è pace per i dannati. - No, infatti!

translation.en: [current Robbie] I set out to make an album, but I didn't know how I was gonna do it.
translation.it: Decisi di incidere un album, ma non sapevo come.

translation.en: [current Robbie] There was a list of people that was sent to me,
translation.it: Mi mandarono una sfilza di persone,

translation.en: and one was Guy Chambers, and I went, "Him."
translation.it: e una di loro era Guy Chambers. Scelsi lui.

translation.en: He was a jobbin' musician
considering becomin' a teacher 'cause things were drying up.
translation.it: che stava pensando di diventare insegnante perché era quasi rimasto all'asciutto.

translation.en: Apart from the leak in his roof, which he had and couldn't pay to be fixed.
translation.it: Non fosse per la perdita dal tetto che non aveva i soldi per riparare.

translation.en: So, we really needed each other.
-Good t… Good takes? -Yeah.
-Good takes? -Yeah. Very good.
-You should have a little break now. -Great. Tell 'em.
translation.it: - Meglio fare una pausa. - Ok. Diglielo.

translation.en: Have a little break. A walk up the street or something.
translation.it: Fai una breve pausa. Una passeggiata o altro.

translation.en: Might want a coat.
[Robbie] I think I'll have a sit down, actually.
Okay.
On account of standing up has made me sick.
translation.it: A stare in piedi mi sento male.

translation.en: Sitting down has made me great.
[current Robbie] Life thru a Lens, which was the first album,
translation.it: Life thru a Lens, il primo album,

translation.en: was written in 12 days, when I found Guy.
translation.it: fu scritto in 12 giorni, quando trovai Guy.

translation.en: And… I thought we had created something of worth.
translation.it: Mi sembrava che avessimo creato qualcosa di valore.

translation.en: But we are looking at somebody in free fall.
translation.it: Ma quella che vedete era una persona in caduta libera.

translation.en: Addicted to cocaine and alcohol.
It's impossible to help myself.
translation.it: Mi era impossibile aiutarmi da solo.

translation.en: It's impossible to stop.
[Guy] You all right?
-[Robbie] Fine. -[laughter]
I don't think there's a chance to feel anythin' other than hungover.
translation.it: Credo fossi perennemente in fase di post-sbronza.

translation.en: And then
not hungover because you are
yet again in the process of, um, creating a future hangover.
-[background chatter] -[woman] I'm drunk as a skunk.
I sound… I sound brilliant after that many glasses.
translation.it: Io sono fresco come una rosa dopo tutti questi bicchieri.

translation.en: -[woman] We've done well. Hurrah! -Hurrah!
[woman] More pineapple!
[Guy] I mean, I knew when I met him,
translation.it: Sapevo, quando l'ho conosciuto, che beveva e delirava.

translation.en: he was drinking, and he had the shakes.
translation.it: quando l'ho conosciuto, che beveva e delirava.

translation.en: He was so on the edge and, um,
you know…
[interviewer] Challenging? Yeah. Of course.
It's really… It's really challenging.
[Guy] Fuck.
[Robbie] Fuck.
[current Robbie] I think this is the most difficult bit to watch.
translation.it: Credo sia la parte più difficile da guardare.

translation.en: Because of… [sighs]
…what I'm putting myself through.
[young Robbie] The last 12 months, I've just sort of
lost meself into oblivion of I don't know what.
translation.it: mi sono come perso nell'oblio e non so cosa fare.

translation.en: And, uh, finding it difficult doing interviews at the minute.
translation.it: E al momento mi è difficile rilasciare interviste.

translation.en: Only 'cause I'm not sure of what I should and shouldn't be saying about things.
translation.it: Perché non so bene cosa dovrei dire e non dire.

translation.en: And I'm just havin'… I'm having so many… so many doubts about meself.
translation.it: Ho un sacco di dubbi su me stesso.

translation.en: I completely don't like my own company at the minute.
translation.it: Non mi piace nemmeno stare con me stesso.

translation.en: [host] Robbie Williams in the studio!
-Did I mention my new single's out? -[host laughs]
translation.it: Vi ho detto del mio nuovo singolo?

translation.en: -How are you? -Did I mention my new…
Yes, I'm very well. Let's put this here.
-I'm very well, and how are you? -Yeah?
[current Robbie] Everybody knows I'm in trouble. And how are you?
translation.it: - Tutti sapevano dei miei problemi. - Voi come state?

translation.en: [current Robbie] But, um… I didn't care.
I'd gone past the point of no return.
translation.it: Avevo superato il punto di non ritorno.

translation.en: And, um…
I needed grown-ups.
My life had spiraled out of control so severely.
translation.it: La mia vita mi era completamente sfuggita di mano.

translation.en: But my manager understood what needed to happen.
translation.it: Ma il mio manager capì che cosa doveva succedere.

translation.en: I needed to be carted off and taken away to rehab.
translation.it: Dovevano portarmi in clinica a disintossicarmi.

translation.en: [man] Robbie, how you feeling today?
New single out 14th July. It's called "Lazy Days." It's fantastic.
translation.it: Il nuovo singolo, "Lazy Days", è uscito il 14 luglio. Fantastico.

translation.en: [man] Any message for fans who might be a bit worried about you?
translation.it: Cosa vuoi dire ai fan preoccupati per te?

translation.en: Uh, no, don't be worried about me. I'm fine. But a bit… a bit, um… I'm appalled at the turnout.
translation.it: Non preoccupatevi, sto bene. Ma sono sconvolto dall'affluenza.

translation.en: When Michael Barrymore had a problem, there was thousands outside his house.
translation.it: Quando Michael Barrymore era nei guai, erano in 1.000 davanti casa sua.

translation.en: See ya!
[current Robbie] It's a tough watch.
Reliving that again.
I think the root of that darkness was
translation.it: Credo che alla radice di quell'oscurità

translation.en: the perfect storm
of too much too soon.
But just because, in this moment, I couldn't figure out how to live…
translation.it: Anche se a quel punto non riuscivo a capire come vivere…

translation.en: …I knew that it didn't mean that I couldn't.
translation.it: non significava che non ne fossi in grado.

translation.en: You know, you don't wanna be a has-been at 23.
translation.it: A 23 anni non vuoi essere una meteora.

translation.en: [woman] You can have lots of treats.
[current Robbie] And this has to go somewhere because
translation.it: Questa cosa deve portare da qualche parte

translation.en: there's nothin' else.
[woman] "Clean and serene for sixty days"?
Good, innit?
Dead serene.
[current Robbie] I think for me, it became like a weight-loss camp.
translation.it: Per me fu come una gara per perdere peso.

translation.en: Nobody noticed that I was just eatin' a banana a day.
translation.it: Non si accorsero che mangiavo solo una banana ogni giorno.

translation.en: [young Robbie] Towards the end of 30 days, gettin' up towards my 60-day one,
translation.it: Alla fine, arrivato al mio 61esimo giorno,

translation.en: I started to get very nervous.
-Gimme a line. Gimme a line. -[laughter]
[man] Is that my car?!
[current Robbie] It's amazing how alive I am instantly.
-[woman] Action. -[man] Robbie!
[current Robbie] And all it's taken is 60 days.
-[man] Do it in Spanish. -Do it in Spanish?
…court case.
-…for la meaty goodness. But also… -[laughter]
translation.it: Per la beata santità. Ma anche…

translation.en: There's life there.
[woman] Robbie is back. Whoa, whoa.
[both] Robbie is back. Robbie is back. Whoa, whoa.
translation.it: - Robbie è tornato. - Robbie è tornato.

translation.en: [current Robbie] It had been two years since Take That.
translation.it: Erano passati due anni dai tempi dei Take That.

translation.en: I'd waited a long time. I needed to get goin'.
translation.it: Avevo aspettato a lungo. Dovevo andare avanti.

translation.en: [young Robbie] Here you join us backstage tonight and, um,
translation.it: Siete qui con noi dietro le quinte

translation.en: gettin' nervous.
"Am I big enough? Am I enough?" All that sorta gig.
translation.it: Mi chiedo se sia all'altezza e cose così.

translation.en: Don't call it a comeback!
Come on, then!
-[applause] -[man] Robbie!
[young Robbie] I spent two years forgettin' why I was doin' this job.
translation.it: Ho passato due anni a dimenticare perché facevo questo mestiere.

translation.en: What I was doin' it for.
It's not for the money. It's not for the critical acclaim.
translation.it: Non è per i soldi o per il successo di critica.

translation.en: I want to entertain. That's what I wanna do.
translation.it: Voglio far divertire. Questo voglio fare.

translation.en: [current Robbie] Somethin' very excitin' is happenin'. I was learning how to be an entertainer.
translation.it: Stava succedendo qualcosa di esaltante. Stavo imparando a fare l'intrattenitore.

translation.en: Something that people could come and watch.
translation.it: Qualcuno che le gente venisse a vedere.

translation.en: But the record company needed me to return on their investment.
translation.it: La casa discografica aveva bisogno di recuperare l'investimento.

translation.en: The album comes out, and it sells in total 33,000 copies.
translation.it: L'album esce e vende in tutto 33.000 copie.

translation.en: You know, there's a lot of jeopardy ridin' on this
because it was all on me.
[as Elvis Presley] Thank you very much.
-Was it bad last night? -Yeah.
translation.it: - È andata male ieri sera? - Sì.

translation.en: -Is it bad every night? -No… Well, it's just one of the problem songs.
translation.it: - Va male tutte le sere? - No. È solo una canzone il problema.

translation.en: Just trying to find a way of helping you so you can get that pitch.
translation.it: Sto cercando un modo per aiutarti a farla bene.

translation.en: -Thank you very much. -It's just that song, innit?
translation.it: - Grazie mille. - Solo quella canzone, no?

translation.en: "Old Before I Die" has sometimes been a little bit hit and miss as well.
translation.it: Anche "Old Before I Die" è un po' incostante a volte.

translation.en: I think that's 'cause at that point in the set, you're really hyped up.
translation.it: Credo sia perché a quel punto della scaletta sei super carico.

translation.en: You've got to listen more, that's all. Listen to what everyone's doing.
translation.it: Devi ascoltare di più, tutto qua. Ascoltare cosa fanno gli altri.

translation.en: 'Cause everyone's doing great stuff.
translation.it: Stanno facendo tutti un ottimo lavoro.

translation.en: You've gotta like, "Ah, right! I'm part of this great band."
translation.it: Devi dirti tipo: "Ok! Faccio parte di questo gruppo".

translation.en: -No, I… That's not the case at all. -Just in terms of listening.
translation.it: - Ma non è così. - Solo per quanto riguarda l'ascoltare.

translation.en: -Okay. -Sometimes you just…
It doesn't always… I dunno, it just…
translation.it: Non è sempre… Non so, è solo…

translation.en: You're just thinking of how you can put this now, aren't you?
translation.it: Stai pensando a come dirmelo, eh?

translation.en: -No, no, no! -[Robbie laughs]
-Go on, put it in any way you like. -No, I mean, I just…
translation.it: - Spara, mettila giù come vuoi. - No, è solo…

translation.en: I just think you're giving 100% to the crowd,
translation.it: Credo che tu stia dando il 100% al pubblico

translation.en: not necessarily holding back, going, "I should concentrate on being the singer--"
translation.it: e non ti concentri sul fare il cantante…

translation.en: This is five minutes before I'm goin' on to do a gig.
translation.it: Tra cinque minuti devo uscire sul palco.

translation.en: D'you know what I mean?
-[man] What's the matter-- -What do you want now?
-Piss off. -[man] You wearing that?
-Yeah. -[man] You look a cunt.
Go out there and be confident, Rob. [laughs]
translation.it: Va' là fuori e spacca, Rob.

translation.en: [current Robbie] Figuratively speaking, my career was falling off a cliff.
translation.it: La mia carriera stava colando a picco.

translation.en: And I'd had quite a few goes with singles that wouldn't be allowed to happen now.
translation.it: Avevamo azzardato con un paio di singoli, ma non potevamo permettercelo.

translation.en: And a memo goes round the record company.
translation.it: Nella casa discografica girava la voce

translation.en: I am about to be dropped.
[young Robbie] When you find yourself starin' into an abyss,
translation.it: Quando davanti a te c'è solo l'abisso,

translation.en: you just might find yourself staring back.
-[man] I think I know what you mean. -[Robbie laughs]
[Robbie] Right, stop.
[current Robbie] It looks as though that's it for the Williams boy.
What a lovely day for it.
[current Robbie] But in my back pocket, I had somethin' special.
translation.it: Ma avevo in serbo una cosa speciale.

translation.en: [Guy] "Angels."
"Angels" comes out, and then thank God for that because
everything changed.
[host] He's back. He's live. He's better than ever. He's Robbie Williams.
translation.it: È tornato. Dal vivo. Più in forma che mai. Robbie Williams.

translation.en: [DJ] …Robbie Williams, with a chart climber.
[current Robbie] Something was connecting…
-♪ She won't foresake me… ♪ -…and you could just feel this momentum.
It was the rocket taking off. With a… [whooshes]
translation.it: Come un razzo che decollava. Con un…

translation.en: [cockney accent] Currently, 'avin' an 'it in Shveden.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto il botto in Svezia.

translation.en: So we may go to Shveden, as we are 'avin' an 'it.
translation.it: Quindi ce ne andiamo in Svezia.

translation.en: [current Robbie] The album sales are gettin' bigger. The audiences are gettin' bigger.
translation.it: Le vendite dell'album salivano. Il pubblico aumentava.

translation.en: From the jaws of defeat,
we seem to be making headway into the world.
[man] Open the window. Let the sound in.
translation.it: Apri la finestra. Senti che chiasso.

translation.en: [man] Moon! Moon!
[DJ] Is it always like that when we open the window in a radio station,
translation.it: È sempre così quando apriamo la finestra in una radio

translation.en: and all the girls stood outside scream and shout?
translation.it: e le ragazze fuori urlano e gridano.

translation.en: -It's like that outside me launderette! -[DJ] What's it like back home?
translation.it: - È come fuori dalla mia lavanderia! - Com'è tornare a casa?

translation.en: Do you wish sometimes to have a normal life? This is a normal life.
translation.it: - A volte desideri una vita normale? - Questa lo è.

translation.en: I don't know what it is that's so special about that song.
translation.it: Non so cos'abbia di tanto speciale questa canzone.

translation.en: But whatever it is, it had it.
translation.it: Ma qualunque cosa sia, ha fatto centro.

translation.en: -[cheering, whistling] -Thank you!
[man] Hello, Rob.
It's not a silver surprise.
It's not a gold surprise.
It's a platinum surprise!
He's gone platinum, everybody!
translation.it: Ed è disco di platino, gente!

translation.en: Um, I'm gobsmacked with this.
Fantastic.
I've got a career!
Thank you very much.
[woman] Robbie?
It was good!
-[chatter] -[man] Rock-and-roll capital of Surrey.
translation.it: È la capitale rock and roll del Surrey.

translation.en: [Robbie] Right. Bloody 'ell.
-Right? -[man] Yeah.
[woman] He was fab, wasn't he?
[current Robbie] Success definitely, subconsciously, did equal happiness.
translation.it: Il successo, a livello inconscio, coincise con la felicità.

translation.en: -I'm speechless. -[man] Did you enjoy that?
translation.it: - Non ho parole. - Ti è piaciuto?

translation.en: [woman] Absolutely brilliant.
[current Robbie] This is my second go at biting the apple.
translation.it: Il mio secondo tentativo di cavalcare l'attimo.

translation.en: Take That was the first. This is the second.
translation.it: I Take That furono il primo. Quello era il secondo.

translation.en: [woman] Well done.
-[man] Brilliant. -Thank you.
[current Robbie] I'm a pop star now.
I'm the fully thinged… I'm the fully thing thinged.
translation.it: Ero in regola… Avevo tutte le carte in regola.

translation.en: [man 1] Peter Snow getting Robbie's autograph.
translation.it: Peter Snow chiede l'autografo a Robbie.

translation.en: -I think it's a swing to the left. -[man 2] Left?
Oh right. All Saints.
[current Robbie] Fame, in and of of itself, is a playground.
translation.it: La fama, di per sé, è un campo da gioco.

translation.en: And I didn't know who I was gonna be in that playground, but I wanted to be in it.
translation.it: E non sapevo chi sarei stato in quel campo, ma volevo starci.

translation.en: -Sh! -[man] Name and age.
Um, Nicole Appleton, and I'm 23.
[man] If you had one night with Robbie Williams, what would you do?
translation.it: Se passassi una notte con Robbie Williams, cosa faresti?

translation.en: I've done it!
[current Robbie] Nicole Appleton is in a band called All Saints.
translation.it: Nicole Appleton è in una band chiamata All Saints.

translation.en: The less smiley version of the Spice Girls.
translation.it: La versione meno sorridente delle Spice Girls.

translation.en: -I could change it with mine. -[man] That'd be really funny.
translation.it: - Lo cambierei con il mio. - Sarebbe molto divertente.

translation.en: -I should do that? -Yeah!
[current Robbie] So, at some point, our paths were bound to cross,
translation.it: Prima o poi le nostre strade dovevano incrociarsi,

translation.en: and we struck up a relationship together.
She was kind and fun and sweet. You know, she was just a good soul.
translation.it: Era gentile, divertente e dolce. Era un'anima buona.

translation.en: With my relationship with Nic, it was very important to me
translation.it: La mia relazione con Nic fu molto importante per me

translation.en: to learn to become the man that I was supposed to be.
translation.it: per forgiare l'uomo che sarei diventato.

translation.en: You know, these are miracles that are happening in my life.
translation.it: Sono questi i miracoli che mi succedono nella vita.

translation.en: You know when something's right?
translation.it: Sapete quando una cosa è giusta?

translation.en: -Tonight's right! -[screaming]
And I'm so 'appy!
[current Robbie] There was no left. There was no right.
translation.it: Non c'era sinistra. Non c'era destra.

translation.en: There was only forward.
Hi, mate. What's the date?
-[Guy] It's 19th January. -19th January.
The new year. 1998.
-Here at Jake's place in Jamaica. -[Guy] Wahey.
translation.it: Siamo a casa di Jake in Giamaica.

translation.en: We came from Gatwick yesterday, me and Guy.
translation.it: Sono arrivato ieri da Gatwick, con Guy. Saluta, Guy.

translation.en: -Say hello, Guy. -[Guy] Hello, Rob.
translation.it: Sono arrivato ieri da Gatwick, con Guy. Saluta, Guy. - Ciao. - Ciao, bello.

translation.en: Hello, mate. Come with me.
translation.it: - Ciao. - Ciao, bello. Vieni con me.

translation.en: We brought our own studio with us.
translation.it: Ci siamo portati dietro lo studio.

translation.en: A little 8-track. So we can record while we're out here.
translation.it: Un registratore. Per registrare mentre siamo qui.

translation.en: That's safe, innit? Keep it under lock and key.
translation.it: È sicuro, vero? Lo tieni sottochiave.

translation.en: [Guy] Move up a bit.
Don't want your ugly mug on my video diary.
translation.it: Non voglio il tuo muso nel mio video-diario.

translation.en: I look really white.
That's 'cause you are.
[posh accent] He's from Surrey, you know.
[current Robbie] Traditionally, there is the "difficult second album" syndrome.
translation.it: Di solito c'è la sindrome da "secondo album difficile".

translation.en: I didn't feel that way with Guy.
translation.it: Con Guy non mi sentivo così.

translation.en: I think that what we were doing together also excited him.
translation.it: Credo che anche lui si esaltasse a fare quello che facevamo.

translation.en: ♪ I've come to remind you That we'll come and find you ♪
translation.it: Sono venuto a ricordarti Che verremo e ti troveremo

translation.en: ♪ This is a happy song ♪
He was a older brother,
mentor, musical mentor…
…and I was a student.
-It's okay there. -♪ Do-do do-do-do ♪
[Guy] As you can see, it is now pouring down with rain.
translation.it: Come potete vedere, sta piovendo a dirotto.

translation.en: Quick. Quick, Rob. Because it mustn't get wet. The stuff.
translation.it: Svelto, Rob. La roba non deve bagnarsi.

translation.en: [current Robbie] There was so much love between me and Guy in those moments.
translation.it: C'è stato tanto amore tra me e Guy in quei momenti.

translation.en: ♪ …news from Jamaica ♪
[current Robbie] And this was a beautiful way to spend your life.
translation.it: E… era un modo bellissimo di vivere la vita.

translation.en: -[Guy] It's rather nice, isn't it? -[Robbie] It's fantastic.
Sure we're gonna get a lot of inspiration here.
translation.it: Ci verrà un sacco di ispirazione qui.

translation.en: -It's amazing. -This is amazing.
[Guy] This is just… I think it's one of the most amazing places I've ever been.
translation.it: È davvero… Uno dei posti più belli in cui sia mai stato.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Actually. It's up there.
Have you been to Rhyl?
-It's very like-- -In Wales.
It's just like this.
-[phone rings] -[Guy] Oh dear, where's the phone?
Hello?
Is that Nicky?
It's Guy.
She's on the telephone.
-Is she? -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-Can I just leave it here? -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Guy's gonna leave the video camera here.
translation.it: Guy vuole lasciare la telecamera qui.

translation.en: So, I am possibly looking at the most amazing view that, um,
translation.it: Sto ammirando la veduta più spettacolare

translation.en: I've ever seen in my life.
Yeah, honestly, babe, I'm not kiddin' you, I walked into this place…
translation.it: Sul serio, non sto scherzando, sono entrato qui dentro,

translation.en: I'm about 3,000 feet up in the mountains.
translation.it: sono a circa 1.000 metri tra i monti,

translation.en: There's… There's just forests everywhere.
I can see Kingston… I'm not kidding you, right,
translation.it: riesco a vedere Kingston… Non scherzo, davvero.

translation.en: as I walked in and I was shown around the place,
translation.it: Quando sono entrato e ho visto il posto,

translation.en: um, I got onto the balcony and just cried.
translation.it: sono uscito sul balcone e ho pianto.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
-[Nicole] Wow! -Just like…
Just so… proud.
It's… You know, it's like, I'm like a child there.
Talkin' to a mum.
About what I'm experiencing and…
translation.it: Di ciò che sta provando e…

translation.en: The truth is, um…
I was still… still a baby.
You know, I was 16 when I joined Take That.
translation.it: Avevo 16 anni quando entrai nei Take That.

translation.en: And I guess that there is some sort of broken teenager in there
translation.it: E suppongo che dentro di me ci fosse un adolescente a pezzi

translation.en: that will be, um,
tryin' to sort out the wreckage of the past.
translation.it: di rimediare ai casini del passato.

translation.en: But… I couldn't let it go.
translation.it: Ma non riuscivo a lasciarlo andare.

translation.en: [Robbie] "Do you feel cut up?"
"Do you feel cut up
by the people… duh-duh-duh… you've met?"
-"That you've left by the wayside." -No, it's gotta rhyme with "et."
translation.it: - "Che hai lasciato per strada." - No, deve fare rima.

translation.en: -"Have you popped your clogs yet?" -Mm.
[current Robbie] I suppose, at this point, my memories of being in that band
translation.it: Immagino che, a questo punto, i ricordi della band

translation.en: are sullied with how I felt during the process.
translation.it: siano offuscati dalla sensazione del processo creativo.

translation.en: So, you can imagine what this…
young man is feelin'.
♪ I guess you know I hate you ♪
-[guitar playing] -♪ Needless to say ♪
♪ I guess you know I hate you ♪
♪ Are you still around? ♪
♪ Why haven't you managed to die yet? ♪
translation.it: Ancora non ce l'hai fatta a morire?

translation.en: ♪ How can you sleep? ♪
-D'you know what, though? -What?
Don't like the chorus.
The fact that it's so… jolly?
So j… I don't want it to be jolly. I don't… It… It doesn't feel right when I'm singing it.
translation.it: Non lo voglio allegro. Non mi convince quando lo canto.

translation.en: I want it to be nasty. I want it to be as nasty as the verse.
translation.it: Voglio che sia cattivo. Come la strofa.

translation.en: I'm not being…
…ironic or…
I'm being fuckin' serious. Fuckin' hate these cunts.
translation.it: Sono serissimo, cazzo. Odio queste teste di cazzo.

translation.en: ♪ How do you sleep? How do you laugh? ♪
translation.it: Come fai a dormire? Come fai a ridere?

translation.en: ♪ How do you cry? How do you lie? ♪
translation.it: Come fai a piangere? Come fai a mentire?

translation.en: ♪ How do you touch? How do you feel? ♪
translation.it: Come fai a toccare? Come ti senti?

translation.en: ♪ How do you keep me from… ♪
Angry. Venom. Venom.
[man] Spittle.
Spittle! [Guy] That's good, that.
Yeah, I can see that. Yeah.
[current Robbie] Teddy bear!
Come, come get in bed.
Put your drink down, and just come and get behind me. Gimme a cuddle.
translation.it: Metti giù la bibita, vieni qui dietro di me. Abbracciami.

translation.en: Hi, Daddy.
Talkin' about the… the band I used to be in.
translation.it: Sto parlando della band di cui facevo parte.

translation.en: -Yes. Question? -Yes.
Who did you hate the most and why?
translation.it: Chi odiavi di più e perché?

translation.en: Who did I hate the most?
I disliked Gary the most
translation.it: Quello che mi piaceva meno era Gary

translation.en: because
he… was the one that was supposed to 'ave
translation.it: perché lui era quello che avrebbe avuto tutto e fatto carriera.

translation.en: the everythin' and the career.
translation.it: che avrebbe avuto tutto e fatto carriera.

translation.en: And I wanted to make him pay.
I was…
-How? -I was vengeful.
By havin' the career
that he was supposed to have.
Here's a song about a group of people
translation.it: Questa è una canzone su un gruppo di persone

translation.en: that I used to be with an awful lot.
translation.it: con cui sono stato a lungo.

translation.en: Those people are called Take That.
translation.it: Queste persone sono i Take That.

translation.en: You know, there was five of us. There was one very small one.
translation.it: Lo sapete, eravamo in cinque. Ce n'era uno molto piccolo.

translation.en: And, uh… one had like a mop on his head.
translation.it: E uno che aveva come un mocio in testa. Mi hanno detto di rinfrescarvi la memoria.

translation.en: The other one had a mohican,
and he was a twat.
And the other one looked a bit like this.
translation.it: E l'altro faceva un po' così.

translation.en: Listen.
There's somebody booing me down here
that actually likes Gary Barlow.
translation.it: perché in realtà ama Gary Barlow.

translation.en: He's not selling any more records now, girls!
Let's face it, he's dead!
translation.it: Diciamo le cose come stanno: è morto!

translation.en: I'm sorry that I treated Gary like that.
translation.it: Mi dispiace di aver trattato Gary così.

translation.en: Nobody graduates from childhood fame
well balanced.
The years of finding yourself, maturing, and growin' up…
translation.it: Sono gli anni in cui cerchi te stesso, maturi, cresci…

translation.en: that everybody has is taken away from you.
Um, Nicky?
Will you marry me?
"Yes"?
Good.
All right, then. Bye!
[current Robbie] I guess that I'm tryin' to convince myself
translation.it: Immagino stessi cercando di convincermi di essere il genere di persona

translation.en: that I'm the kind of person that is ready for that kind of commitment.
translation.it: Immagino stessi cercando di convincermi di essere il genere di persona pronta per un impegno simile.

translation.en: I know I'm not.
I couldn't look after myself.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a badare a me stesso.

translation.en: I was in no fit state
translation.it: Non ero in uno stato tale

translation.en: to offer myself as a partner.
-Are you gonna sit on the sound thing? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ci sarai al sound check? - Sì.

translation.en: [current Robbie] And, um, the relationship with Nic ended a few months after this.
translation.it: La relazione con Nic finì qualche mese dopo.

translation.en: Stop filmin' now.
[man] Just a bit of traffic, then.
[woman] Probably why he's goin'.
-[woman] I can't believe that happened. -[Robbie] Look at that!
translation.it: - Non posso credere sia successo. - Guarda che roba!

translation.en: -[man] Wow! Fuck! -[woman] It's like a sea of…
translation.it: - Cavolo! - È come un mare di… - Cazzo! È tutto… - C'è fango ovunque!

translation.en: [Robbie] It's all mud.
translation.it: - Cazzo! È tutto… - C'è fango ovunque!

translation.en: [current Robbie] I felt like I was an infant
in the grown-up world.
So, I'm just about to go on at Glastonbury, and I don't know what's gonna 'appen.
translation.it: Stavo andando al Glastonbury e non sapevo cosa sarebbe successo.

translation.en: It's, uh… 88,000 people.
It's the epoch of credibility.
And it's the biggest gig of my career so far.
translation.it: Era l'esibizione più grande della mia carriera fino a quel momento.

translation.en: Come on!
Let's fuckin' 'ave it!
I'm terrified.
Absolutely terrified.
[current Robbie] This had the opportunity to go very badly.
translation.it: C'era il rischio che andasse malissimo.

translation.en: There's still a bit of me goin', "I'm still Rob from Stoke-on-Trent."
translation.it: Una parte di me pensava ancora: "Sono solo Rob di Stoke-on-Trent.

translation.en: "I'm still 16."
That's one of those moments where I think I'm gonna be found out.
translation.it: Era uno di quei momenti in cui ti affermi come musicista.

translation.en: If you must!
-[current Robbie] Lo and behold… -♪ …angels instead ♪
…they embraced me!
[current Robbie] Me.
Bobbins from Take That.
[current Robbie] How does it feel to have thousands of people
translation.it: Come ci si sente ad avere migliaia di persone

translation.en: sing the words that you've written back to you?
translation.it: che cantano con te le parole che hai scritto?

translation.en: It is intoxicatin'.
[current Robbie] It felt like this is what I'm supposed to be doin'!
translation.it: Ti fa credere che quello sia il tuo destino.

translation.en: But then you realize, subconsciously or consciously, that
translation.it: Ma poi, consapevolmente o meno, ti rendi conto di una cosa:

translation.en: "I can't go back."
I'm on a runaway train.
translation.it: Ero su un treno in corsa.

translation.en: And this was gonna grow bigger and bigger and bigger.
translation.it: E tutto era destinato a ingigantirsi ancora.

translation.en: I'm not looking forward to watching what's next.
translation.it: Non muoio dalla voglia di vedere il seguito.

translation.en: I didn't have the tools to deal with
translation.it: Non avevo gli strumenti per affrontare

translation.en: what's to come.
